long_description: Whether you're a recreational boater or a freshwater rescue professional, the NRS Pilot knife fits the bill with convenient access and a quick-release design. Versatile blade features both straight and serrated edges for all kinds of cutting tasks; blunt tip helps protect against accidental punctures of gear and skin. Glass-reinforced nylon sheath locks the knife in place, yet releases it instantly when you squeeze both sides of the release; sheath attaches firmly to a PFD lash tab or belt. The NRS Pilot knife is made of a single, solid piece of 420 HC stainless steel with glass-reinforced polypropylene scales added to the contoured handle for enhanced grip. Handle features a bottle opener and a glass-breaker tip.
